reviewText: Great visuals!  Great music!  The sounds and the geometric visuals combine to create a synergistic effect that truly raises consciousness.  Wish I had this when I was a lot younger!
Great video.  I use it to open some of my classes - a great meditation tool that mellows out the students to focus on the school day.

I LOVE this video! It can relax you in just 5 minutes of watching it. Watch the whole thing and all your stress & worries melt away. The visuals are beautiful & remind me of looking through a kaleidoscope. Music is awesome too.
